name: Java CI - Automated Unit Tests & Reports

on:
  push:
    branches: [ "main" ]
  pull_request:
    branches: [ "main" ]

jobs:
  test:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    env:
      MAVEN_OPTS: "-Djava.awt.headless=true"

    steps:
    - name: Checkout repo
      uses: actions/checkout@v4

    - name: Set up JDK 17
      uses: actions/setup-java@v4
      with:
        java-version: '17'
        distribution: 'temurin'
        cache: maven

    - name: Build & run unit tests (headless)
      run: mvn -B -Djava.awt.headless=true clean test surefire-report:report

    - name: Upload Surefire XML reports
      if: always()
      uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
      with:
        name: surefire-xml-reports
        path: target/surefire-reports/

    - name: Upload Surefire HTML site (human readable)
      if: always()
      uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
      with:
        name: surefire-html-report
        path: target/site/surefire-report.html

    - name: Show quick status
      if: always()
      run: |
        echo "Workflow finished. Download artifacts from the run (Artifacts section)."
